name: Górnicy vs Obcy
description:
Needs 2 X-Box gamepads to play. The goal is to push your advantage by shooting other player, so that when the time ends you are on the wining side.

CONTROLS:

-Left Stick = movement & aiming

-A = jump

-X = basic shot

-Y = alternative shot

-B = NAPALM (if you have one)
